Title: The Frond Files
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux, Mike Benner (staff writer), Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (executive story editor), Kelvin Yu (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (executive story editor), Steven Davis (executive story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: The Belcher children write fantasy essays about their school that their parents find offensive.
